subject: Any tools for Test Case generation?
msgSnippet: I have a project in which I want to some tools that can automatically generate test case to exercise given execution path. The path is derived from bytecode
messageBody:
I have a project in which I want to some tools that can automatically
generate test case to exercise given execution path. The path is
derived from bytecode but may be ablt to map back to source code
level.

For example, I have a fuction

void fun(int a, int b)
{
1 a=b;
2 if (a<b){
3 x=a;
4 }else{
5 x=b;
6}
7
}

And suppose I want the execution path is (1,2, 3, 7). I need a tool
for generating an input for the path.

I try to use JTest but not able to find any feature in Jtest which
can do the task. I wonder if there any tool which has that feature?
Can JUnit perform it?

Thank you
